game.internal.assets

Class Assets

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.internal.assets.Assets

  • public class Assets
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class to allow for global access to assets (e.g. sprites and fonts) .
    Version:
    1.0 - January 10th 2024
    Author:
    Tommy Shan

        public static void initialize(int size)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        initialize Loads, initializes, and processes the assets, and sets the instance to the instance variable.
        Parameters:

        Throws:
